content.rendered:
Financial calendar for Aqualis ASA

FINANCIAL YEAR 2016

Quarterly Report – Q4 – 02/17/2017

FINANCIAL YEAR 2017

Quarterly Report – Q1 – 04/27/2017
Quarterly Report – Q2 – 07/21/2017
Quarterly Report – Q3 – 26/10/2017

Annual General Meeting – 15/05/2017

The reservation dates are the subject to change

For further information, please contact:
Kim Boman, CFO
+47 959 63 912
kim.boman@aqualis.no
This information is published pursuant to the Requirements set out in the Continuing Obligations.
